about.name: SAHAL SALIM
about.title: Software Engineer
about.subTitle: I develop full-stack applications and user-friendly web solutions
about.description: Technically skilled and solution-focused Software Engineer with experience building full-stack applications using Java, Spring Boot, React.js, and MySQL. I'm comfortable bridging development with real-world needs — whether it's building user-friendly platforms or collaborating on team-driven projects. I bring a balanced mindset: logic-driven, design-aware, and open to growth beyond just code.
about.quote: Building solutions that make a difference

timeline.summary: Developed and maintained full-stack applications, including billing software and CRM platforms, handling front-end, back-end, and database integration.
bulletPoints: Developed and maintained full-stack applications, including billing software and CRM platforms, handling front-end, back-end, and database integration.
Collaborated on feature development, API integrations, and UI/UX improvements to meet business needs.
Contributed to Code Souq Academy platforms, building job-oriented training applications for students.
Gained hands-on experience with agile workflows and production deployments, delivering solutions for real-world problems.

timeline.summary: Completed intensive training in Java Full Stack Development with real-world projects using Spring Boot, React.js, and SQL.
bulletPoints: Completed intensive training in Java Full Stack Development with real-world projects using Spring Boot, React.js, and SQL.
Built strong foundations in scalable application development, problem-solving, and collaborative coding.

timeline.company_name: MES Institute of Technology and Management
timeline.summary: Completed B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering with focus on software development.
bulletPoints: Completed B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering (2020-2024).
Strong foundation in programming, algorithms, and software engineering principles.
Hands-on experience with various programming languages and development tools.
Active participation in technical projects and collaborative learning.
Developed problem-solving skills and analytical thinking capabilities.

projects.title: BillSouq - Complete Billing & Inventory Management Solution
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive billing and inventory management solution for IT SOUQ LLP with GST compliance, multi-printer support, and complete business analytics. Features include sales & purchase management, inventory tracking, detailed reports, and hardware integration with POS systems, barcode scanners, and thermal printers.

projects.title: CRM Mobile Application
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive Customer Relationship Management mobile application for IT SOUQ LLP with client tracking, lead management, and sales pipeline features. Built with modern mobile technologies, featuring offline capabilities, real-time synchronization, and intuitive user interface for field sales teams.

projects.title: CRM-Manufacturing Web Application
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive web-based CRM system specifically designed for manufacturing industries with production tracking, quality control, supplier management, and inventory optimization. Features include real-time production monitoring, quality assurance workflows, and integrated reporting for manufacturing operations.

projects.title: IT SOUQ Website
projects.description: Designed and developed the official corporate website for IT SOUQ LLP featuring product showcases, service portfolios, and company information. Built with modern web technologies, responsive design, and optimized performance for showcasing IT solutions, CCTV systems, and billing software products.

projects.title: Khair Innovation Website
projects.description: Developed a professional website for Khair Innovation showcasing their services and portfolio. Built with modern web technologies featuring responsive design, interactive elements, and optimized user experience for presenting innovation solutions and company capabilities.

services.name: Full Stack Development
services.desc: Complete web application development using React.js, Spring Boot, and MySQL. Building scalable and efficient solutions for your business needs.

services.name: Backend Development
services.desc: Robust backend solutions using Java, Spring Boot, and MySQL. RESTful API development and database design for scalable applications.

services.name: Frontend Development
services.desc: Modern and responsive user interfaces using React.js, HTML5, CSS3, and Bootstrap. Creating engaging user experiences.

services.name: Database Design
services.desc: Efficient database design and optimization using MySQL. Creating robust data structures and implementing secure data management solutions.

services.name: API Development
services.desc: RESTful API development and integration services. Building secure and efficient APIs for seamless application connectivity.

services.name: Mobile App Development
services.desc: Native Android application development using Java and Android Studio. Creating user-friendly mobile solutions.

services.name: Desktop Application Development
services.desc: Cross-platform desktop application development using Electron. Building comprehensive business management software with advanced features and reporting capabilities.

testimonials.name: Zed watches
testimonials.review: I had the pleasure of working closely with Sahal on a challenging full-stack project. He is a highly skilled developer who consistently delivered excellent results. His ability to understand complex requirements and implement efficient solutions using Java and React.js was truly impressive. I would highly recommend him to any organization looking for a talented full-stack developer.

testimonials.name: sufiyan
testimonials.review: Throughout our project at IT SOUQ, Sahal demonstrated exceptional technical skills and a strong work ethic. He consistently met deadlines and produced high-quality code that exceeded our expectations. His proactive approach to problem-solving and effective communication made him a valuable member of our development team.

testimonials.name: Abhi
testimonials.review: I had the pleasure of collaborating with Sahal on a complex e-commerce web application project. His ability to translate business requirements into functional, user-friendly features using Spring Boot and React.js was impressive. He consistently delivered high-quality work and was always open to feedback and learning new technologies.

testimonials.name: Deepa
testimonials.review: Sahal is a skilled developer with a keen eye for detail and excellent problem-solving abilities. He played a crucial role in our team, consistently producing clean, efficient code. His collaborative nature and willingness to take on new challenges make him an invaluable asset to any development project.

testimonials.name: Sanjeev
testimonials.review: Working with Sahal was an absolute delight. His professionalism and technical prowess in Java full-stack development were evident from day one. He consistently delivered top-notch code and went above and beyond to ensure the success of our CRM application project. I highly recommend him for any development endeavor.
